attributes.comment:
Re: DHS Docket No. USCIS- 2006-0044
To Whom it May Concern:
I have reviewed the proposed regulation to increase fees for applications and
petitions that affect adoptive parents. As a parent hoping to adopt internationally,
I am alarmed and deeply troubled by the severity of the proposed increases.
Incremental rate increases are expected and understandable, but with some fees
more than doubling there is a terrible squeeze put on the charitable people who
are already, in most cases, stretching the family budget to make a home for an
orphaned child. Adoption should not be limited to the wealthy, but those are the
only families who will be able to afford these proposed fees without concern.
Please consider lowering the percentages by which these fees will be increased.
It would be intolerable if the adoption of even one child was compromised because
a family could not afford the increases.

Sincerely,
Kara McKinzie
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kara McKenzie
